mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MAIL (ID, MAIL_TITLE, MAIL_CONTENT, MAIL_SEND_TIME, MAIL_OPEN_OK, SEND_USER_ID, RECEIVE_USER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_MAIL.NEXTVAL, #{mailTitle}, #{mailContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0, #{sendUserId}, (SELECT ID FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{receiveUserEmail}) )
mapper.select: SELECT TM.ID, TM.MAIL_TITLE, TM.MAIL_SEND_TIME, TU.USER_NICKNAME AS sendUserNickName FROM TBL_MAIL TM JOIN TBL_USER TU ON TM.SEND_USER_ID = TU.ID WHERE TM.RECEIVE_USER_ID = #{receiveUserId} AND TM.MAIL_RECEIVE_USER_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY TM.MAIL_SEND_TIME DESC

SELECT TM.ID, TM.MAIL_TITLE, TM.MAIL_SEND_TIME, TU.USER_NICKNAME AS receiveUserNickName FROM TBL_MAIL TM JOIN TBL_USER TU ON TM.RECEIVE_USER_ID = TU.ID WHERE TM.SEND_USER_ID = #{sendUserId} AND TM.MAIL_SEND_USER_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY TM.MAIL_SEND_TIME DESC
